de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.xml

Class ScenarioTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.xml.TestSetUp
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.xml.ScenarioTest

  • @PrepareForTest(value={Scenario.class,Fragment.class,DomainModel.class})
public class ScenarioTest
extends TestSetUp
    This class tests the Scenario. This class uses mock objects to prevent the Scenario from communicating with the ProcessEditor Server.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.xml.TestSetUp

        CREATE_FRAGMENT_METHOD, FETCH_DOMAIN_MODEL_METHOD, FETCH_VERSION_METHOD, SET_DOMAIN_MODEL_METHOD, TRUNCATE_TABLES_FILE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScenarioTest() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUp()
      Before each Test, create an empty Scenario and mock necessary methods.
      void testConstructorWithURL()
      Tests if the url is set correctly inside the constructor.
      void testDataObjectCreation()
      This Methods Tests if DataObjects are created correctly.
      void testDomainModelVersionImpactOnSaving()
      Test that a scenario is newly saved both when the version of the datamodel has been changed or the datamodel is a new one.
      void testInitializeFromXMLRunsWithoutException()
      This Test asserts parsing without exceptions.
      void testMetaData()
      This Test asserts that MetaInformation about the Scenario are Set correctly.
      void testMigration()
      Assure that migration is initiated when a scenario is written to the database and a new one is initialized which is only changed in so far, that new fragments are addded.
      void testModificationInFragmentScenarioNewlySaved()
      Assure that when a fragment of a scenario has been modified and the older version of the scenario is already in the database, it gets saved as a new scenario.
      void testModificationInScenarioScenarioNewlySaved()
      Assure that when a scenario itself has been modified and the older version of the scenario is already in the database, it gets saved as a new scenario.
      void testNoMigrationWhenFragmentAddedAndModificationsExist()
      Assure that when a fragment of a scenario has been modified and the older version of the scenario is already in the database, it gets saved as a new scenario, even when fragments were added (no migration!).
      void testNoMigrationWhenFragmentDeletedDespiteNewFragment()
      Assure that when a fragment of a scenario has been deleted and the older version of the scenario is already in the database, it gets saved as a new scenario, even when fragments were added (no migration!).
      void testSameScenarioNotDeletedSavedAgain()
      Assure that a unchanged scenario is written to the database once again, if the old scenario in the database which seems to be the same has been deleted.
      void testSameScenarioNotSavedTwice()
      Assure that a unchanged scenario is not written to the database once again.
      void testSaveCompleteScenario()
      Test if the scenario is created and initialized correctly.
      void testSetDomainURL()
      This method tests if the given URL of an XML is correctly set.
      void testTerminationCondition()
      This Methods Tests if the TerminationCondition is set correctly.
      void testVersion()
      This Methods tests whether the version is set correctly or not.
